articles.headline: War against Ukraine France wants to help Mariupol
articles.text: France plans with Turkey and Greece an evacuation campaign from Mariupol. According to the Ukrainian President Selenskyi the situation is still "tragic". Ukrainian armed forces are struggling to recover Cherson.

articles.headline: Liveblog
articles.text:
Ukraine War ++ Selenskyj: Russia blocks help for mariupol ++ 
 The Ukrainian President Selenskyj promises Russia to block help for people in the trapped mariupol. The German energy industry expects to be able to do without Russian hard coal soon. The developments in Liveblog.

articles.headline: Biden in Poland Tedious recovery
articles.text: Tension is expected to talk about US President Biden in Warsaw - the relationship between the two countries was not easy. Already yesterday, at the local appointment near the Ukrainian border, Biden was full of praise for Poland. From T. Teichmann.

articles.headline: Reportage
articles.text:
Escape from the Ukraine of Odessa to Chisinau - and back 
 Ukrainians can still come from the southern town of Odessa to the neighboring Republic of Moldova. Some bring their children and parents across the border - and then drive back. By Clemens Tiekotte.

articles.headline: EU summit ends Scholz against laced energy prices
articles.text: Two days were discussed in Brussels at the EU summit. It was high above all in the discussion about measures against high energy prices. A shared gas purchaser leaned with Chancellor Scholz - he relies on other ways.

articles.headline: Order in the Bundestag gas storage should be sufficiently full
articles.text: The stables of the gas storage should be re-regulated - the Bundestag decided: Specifically, the relevant operators are to be required to gradually fill them up to 90 percent on 1 November of a year.

articles.headline: World mirror
articles.text:
War in Ukraine Syrian fighters for Russia? 
 After Kreml information, tens of thousands of volunteers from the Middle East want to strengthen Russia in the war against Ukraine. Social networks of mauna of Syrian fighters - but their mission can not be carried out. What is known? From Martin Dorm.

articles.headline: Escape from Ukraine landed first flight from Moldova
articles.text: Foreign Minister Baerbock had promised the Republic of Moldova two weeks ago to relieve them with the inclusion of refugees from Ukraine. Now the first evacuation flight was landed at the Frankfurt airport.

articles.headline: Labor market like Ukraine refugees come to jobs
articles.text: More than 230,000 people have fled from Ukraine to Germany. Many of them want to work. And in the labor market, specialists are missing. Where do it hook? From Philipp Baumgärtner.

articles.headline: Donate help for people in Ukraine
articles.text: If you want to donate for people in Ukraine and refuge from Ukraine, you will find aid organizations and bank details here.

articles.headline: Liveblog
articles.text:
Coronavirus pandemic ++ More intensive patients fear ++ 
 The German hospital company expects more intensive patients. The seven-day incidence rises to 1758. The developments in Liveblog.

articles.headline: Virologist Riding in the Day Themes "The virus has not become absolutely harmless"
articles.text: Hundreds of thousands of new corona cases daily - and politics decides loosening. Is this reasonable? Yes, the virologist says outside the daythema interview. But it is important to remain alert and reintroduce if necessary.

articles.headline: Huthi attacks in Saudi Arabia Oll bearings in Jedda stands in flames
articles.text: In the Saudi port city of Jidda, a fuel bearing is on fire - presumed for an air raid of the Hutthi rebels. Nearby is the racetrack of Formula 1, on Sunday the Grand Prix is to be driven.

articles.headline: Planned relief Transport ministers advocate free ticket
articles.text: Countries fear a high level of administrative expenses in the 9-euro monthly ticket for public transport planned by the federal government. Instead, the Ministers of Transport propose a zero ticket ticket.

articles.headline: To analyse
articles.text:
Saarland election The big bangs of the little ones 
 In Saarland, CDU and SPD still have the status as a folk parties. The Left Party was strong, but that's over. Also green, FDP and AFD are weak. Why is that? From Diana Kühner-Mert.

articles.headline: Worldwide climate strike Tens of thousands at "Fridays for Future" demos
articles.text: Worldwide, "Fridays for Future" has called for Demos for climate protection. In Germany alone, there are about 300 rallies. The movement demands, among other things, an end to the deliveries of oil, gas and coal from Russia.

articles.headline: US rock band Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins is dead
articles.text: The drummer of the US rock band Foo Fighters, Taylor Hawkins, has died at the age of 50 years. He was with the band on the world tour and was found dead in a hotel in Colombia. The cause of death is not yet known. From Marcus Schuler.

articles.headline: Lauterbach about new infections dark figure is likely to be twice as high
articles.text: Health Minister Lauterbach has spoken in the face of the many new infections of "no good situation". He even assumes that the number is twice as high as officially reported. He has clear expectations to the federal states.

articles.headline: Russia's war in Ukraine's new focus Donbass?
articles.text: Russia's early march in Ukraine builds, but in Moscow it is trying for a positive reading: the main goal of the first phase was achieved. Now you want to concentrate on the "liberation" of Donbass.

articles.headline: Exclusive
articles.text:
Chechen in Ukraine Kadyrow's Holy War? 
 In Ukraine war, Chechen leader Kadyrov wants to steer with combat troops as a useful helper Putin's. Striking is how he plays with Islamic symbolism. But what does he see? From Eric Beres.

articles.headline: Exclusive
articles.text:
Russia and the AFD influential against Europe 
 The contacts of AFD politicians to a cremal oligarch are even more closely known. Documents that are WDR, NDR and SZ also show a close integration of the European rights with the propaganda machine of the oligarch.

articles.headline: Continue high fluctuations prices on the oil market give
articles.text: Because the EU provisionally dispenses with an embargo and apparently failing the storm damage to a terminal is less dramatic, the fear of bottlenecks in the oil market. That pushes the prices.

articles.headline: Market report
articles.text:
Second win week in a row Wall Street defies interest fears 
 Wall Street went the puff at the weekend. Especially the fear of a sharper US interest rate policy pressed the mood of investors. After all, it was enough for a small plus in the final spurt.

articles.headline: Defeat against Nordmasedonia World Cup again without Italy
articles.text: The football World Cup 2022 in Qatar goes on the stage without Italy: The European champion has failed in the playoff semi-finals surprisingly on Nordmasedonia. Portugal and Wales are one round, Sweden must be in the extension against the Czech Republic.

articles.headline: Weather forecast
articles.text: On Saturday, in the north and northeast, sometimes density and occasional is somewhat a niesel rule possible. Incidentally, it is sunny or at most slightly cloudy. 9 to 22 degrees.
